Hero.title: Empowering Karnataka's Future Innovators
Hero.subtitle: Discover Junior Technical Schools across rural and urban Karnataka. Gain practical skills for a brighter tomorrow.

Chatbot.greeting: Namaskara! How can I help you find a technical school today?
Chatbot.promptOption1: I want to study computers in Bangalore.
Chatbot.promptOption2: Show me rural schools for Agriculture Tech.
